import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Card, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { FaDollarSign } from 'react-icons/fa' import Rating from '../Rating' import products from '../../products' const ProductScreen = ({match, history, location}) => { const [test, setTest] = useState(1); const {image, name, rating, numReviews, price, description, countInStock} = products.find(({_id}) => _id === match.params.id); const StocksCount = []; for(var x = 0 ; x <= countInStock; x++){ StocksCount.push(x++) } console.log(match.params.id); return ( <>

{name}
Price: {price}
 Description: {description} Price: {price} Status: {countInStock > 0 ? `In Stock` : `Out of Stock`} Quantity: Dropdown Button {} Action Another action Something else ) } export default ProductScreen
